title: Swapin
author: Swapin
content: Swapin Flash Campaign - Want to quickly transfer your funds from crypto to fiat? üöÄWe've received many comments and have seen a huge demand from our users the past week. That's why we've decided to launch the Swapin Flash Sale Campaign!All InstaPay crypto to fiat transactions above ‚Ç¨30,000 on Swapin will only occur 0.5% service fee. üìâQuick as the offer only lasts until 1/12/22! ‚è≥Who are we?Swapin (formerly Piixpay) was founded in 2017, when we spotted the potential for crypto to improve the global payments industry, making transactions faster, safer, and cheaper.Our company offers a powerful, yet easy-to-use solution that helps individuals and businesses accept and spend crypto in a smarter way.What do we offer?Swapin is a fully regulated ultra-fast solution between Crypto and Banks. Use Bitcoin to transfer money and pay bills. Empower your business by accepting crypto.Licensed and engineered in Europe - Swapin solutions instantly convert cryptocurrencies into fiat, which is connected directly to a business bank account. Swapin handles the conversion process immediately and without a need for crypto-focused accounting or compliance - Swapin takes care of it all. Coins/Fiat currencies we operate? Swapin‚Äôs list of supported cryptocurrencies includes:Bitcoin (BTC)Ethereum (ETH)Bitcoin Cash (BCH)Litecoin (LTC)Dash (DASH)Tron (TRX)USDT ERC-20USDT TRC-20USDC ERC-20DAI ERC-20Service Coin (ESCT)Currently we support fiat settlements in EUR and GBP with more to come!Psst! Don't need to convert ‚Ç¨30,000 but still want to get a good deal? If you are a newcomer at Swapin we have a special InstaPay promotion. A 20% service fee discount on 3 separate transactions (valid for 90 days) for anyone who signs up via this link: https://app.swapin.com/join/bitcointalkFind us onlineTelegramTwitterLinkedInFacebookLaunch the website.Have some questions? Feel free to leave questions below or email us at: hello@swapin.comWe are here to make a user orientated product. If you have anything to say, we are here to listen!
